name: SourceWorlds
description:
Welcome to SourceWorlds. The Architect is waiting for you!

SourceWorlds is a third-person action-adventure that throws you into the strange SourceWorlds controlled by 'the Architect'.
Solve quests, loot items and have a great time trying to escape this CCC state-of-the-art indie game from the future.




Actually, you just wanted to spend a relaxing retro gaming session with your buddy with these old consoles just still have. Somehow, however, you seem to have a hell of a lot of bad luck and so you are transported into a world that is very unfamiliar to you.

You will find the SourceWorlds are a strange place.

Different ages, different cultures, all seem to be intertwined.

The architect seems to be the all-encompassing power in this world. And you somehow got caught up in this and are desperately looking for a way out of these twisted SourceWorlds to finally get back home to the real world.




In SourceWorlds, you kind of outgrow your old yourself!
  • Find powerful melee weapons with which you can mow down your enemies in close combat.
    Swords, Daggers, Axes, Hammers, Stop Signs - everything your heart desires!
  • Discover magical and inexplicable accessories that give you psychic abilities.
    Become a White Mage, Wield explosive Magic, Lift Thor's Hammer if you're worthy
  • Control unintuitive vehicles that inexplicably don't seem to follow any laws of physics.
    Like, really. Fun to steer Ships, Hovercars and rideable Wolves!
  • Collect unique masks, which give your character its very own flair!
  • Play alone or co-op with up to four of your friends and have the greatest time!
  • Play through awesome quests, let the story sink in!
  • Explore a vast variety of settings like a medieval place, a caribbean sea or a futuristic Sci-Fi world!
  • Get exposed to our bestest dumb humor and gamedesign!

Visit us on Discord! https://discord.gg/Y8jPevXkhg

TideOver Studios
